items.title: News18 Lokmat leads Marathi news segment with unmatched reach and market share
items.description: Another channel from Network18’s portfolio to become number one, News18 Lokmat has left TV9 Marathi and ABP Majha behind in the Marathi news genre

items.title: Tata Elxsi steps up in the race for UAV and eVTOL, signs pact with National Aerospace Lab
items.description: As part of the pact, Tata Elxsi and CSIR-NAL will also create an ecosystem for precision manufacturing, which will bring together stakeholders to foster innovation and address the requirements of advanced air mobility.

items.title: NCC shares soar 5% after Rs 501 crore order from Bengaluru Suburban Rail
items.description: The order, reported by Moneycontrol earlier this month, is from Rail Infrastructure Development Company (Karnataka) and is to be completed within 24 months.

items.title: Shakti Pumps shares rise 2% on plans to raise up to Rs 400 crore through a QIP
items.description: The board will announce the terms and conditions of the proposed fund raise at a later date, aiming to fund expansion.

items.title: Husk Power, world’s biggest mini-grid firm, eyes $400 million fund raise and IPO
items.description: Husk, founded in 2008 in Bihar, is taking advantage of a drive by governments and multilateral lenders such as the World Bank to bring electricity in coming years to the more than 600 million Africans who lack access to it.

items.title: MC Pro’s New Year 2024 portfolio outperformed in volatile times, watch out for the 2025 edition
items.description: In what was inarguably a volatile year for markets, the MC Pro research team’s portfolio returned splendid gains of 31.4 percent as compared to the Nifty’s 11.9 percent increase

items.title: Titan Company: Glowing performance in Q3
items.description: As per Q3FY25 pre-quarter update, Titan Company posted strong growth backed by robust performance across the business segments

items.title: NTPC’s clean energy arm to build $21 billion green hydrogen hub
items.description: NTPC Green Energy Ltd. is developing the project at Pudimadaka, near the city of Visakhapatnam in Andhra Pradesh

items.title: Business for Kalyan Jewellers is shining on strong festive and wedding demand
items.description: Kalyan Jewellers said that the demand was visible in both gold and studded categories, with a healthy same-store-sales-growth of around 24%. The company launched 24 showrooms in India during the quarter, and there is a strong pipeline of showrooms for the current quarter as well.

items.title: Standard Glass Lining IPO GMP: Issue subscribed by over 23x so far on Day 2, check GMP
items.description: IPO news live: Standard Glass Lining Technology IPO was fully subscribed within 20 minutes on day 1 of subscription on January 6

items.title: Adani Group forays into petrochemicals business in JV with Thailand's Indorama Resources
items.description: Indorama Ventures is one of the largest petrochemical producers globally, and is based out of Thailand. It is one of the world’s largest producers of integrated polyester products and fibers, and a key player in the chemical business.

items.title: BPCL approves Rs 1,000 crore IPO of JV company Maharashtra Natural Gas
items.description: Maharashtra Natural Gas (MNGL) is a natural gas distribution company engaged in supplying Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) and Piped Natural Gas (PNG) in Maharashtra.
